subject: Anybody know the Ghost Adventures Guys?
author: urkel23@aol.com
full_text:
--part1_1e203.417b6d18.3a3458cf_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit


I watched another great episode tonight at the Villasca Axe Murder house  
and it was a good show, but....
 
It seems the main focus on their show is evp's and spirit communication,  
which is preferred for my taste.  But they are using the sb7 ghost  box.  
That is the worst box to use for spirit communication, it gets poor  reception 
and the sweep is horrible.  Any voices that could and do come  through are 
drowned out by the unnecessary white noise incorporated into the  sweep.
 
I would like to get in touch with them and give them a quality ghost box to 
 work with.
 
So.....Does anybody know how i can get a hold of these guys?
 
-Steve H.
 
 
 
Steve Hultay
_www.keyportparanormal.com_ (http://www.keyportparanormal.com/) 
_http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/rtsc/_ 
(http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/rtsc/)
